doc:
Jim Bannon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jim_Bannon 0 James Shorttel Bannon (April 9, 1911 – July 28, 1984) was a radio announcer and Hollywood Western film actor known for his work on the I Love a Mystery and Red Ryder series during the 1940s and 1950s. James_Shorttel_Bannon ( April_9_,_1911 – July_28_,_1984 ) was a_radio_announcer and Hollywood_Western_film_actor known for his_work on the_I Love a_Mystery_and_Red_Ryder_series during the_1940s_and_1950s .
